content: Embedding {{productName}} or its part using the <script> tag. Copy the HTML code below and insert it into your HTML file.

comment.text: "This translation key provides a description for embedding or using {{productName}} code via <script> tags in HTML files. It's used to provide instructions on how to insert the code into an HTML file. This text appears in a category subheader for developer tools."

usage.context:
<CodeWrapper height="fit-content">
 <CategorySubHeader className="copy-window-code">
 {`HTML ${t("CodeTitle")}`}
 </CategorySubHeader>
 <Text lineHeight="20px" className="preview-description">
 {t("HtmlCodeDescription", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") })}
 </Text>
 <Textarea value={codeBlock} heightTextArea={153} isReadOnly enableCopy />
 </CodeWrapper>
 );
 const js = (

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Embedding {{productName}} or its part" is not accurately conveyed. "Yerləşdirilməsi" implies placement, but 'embedding' suggests a deeper integration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Daha dərin inteqrasiya etmək üçün {{productName}}-i və ya onun bir hissəsini yerləşdirin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Copy the HTML code below' could be improved for clarity and natural flow in Azerbaijani.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aşağıdakı HTML kodunu surətləyin və ya kopyalayın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'upotus käyttäen <script> tagia' is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'käyttämällä <script> tagia'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{productName}}-n tai sen osan upotus käyttämällä <script> tagia.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'syötä se HTML-tiedostoosi' is grammatically correct but sounds a bit abrupt. It can be improved to be more polite and clear.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{productName}}-n tai sen osan upotus käyttämällä <script> tagia. Kopioi alla oleva HTML-koodi ja lisää se HTML-tiedostoosi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "դրա մասի" (its part) is slightly awkward. While technically correct, it could be improved for smoother reading. It's implying a part *of* the product.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like "{{productName}}-ի կամ դրա բաղադրիչների մասամբ" (with components of {{productName}}) or "{{productName}}-ի կամ դրա միջնորդման մասամբ" (using an intermediary of {{productName}}), depending on the specific context and intended meaning. A more literal, but less elegant option could be "{{productName}}-ի միջնորդի մասամբ".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the colon after the first sentence creates a slightly disjointed feel. It's common in Armenian to flow the second sentence directly after the first. Consider removing it or modifying the sentence structure.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the colon and combine the two sentences: "{{productName}}-ի կամ դրա մասի ներկառուցում <script> պիտակի միջոցով: Պատճենեք ստորև բերված HTML կոդը և տեղադրեք այն ձեր HTML ֆայլում:" -> "{{productName}}-ի կամ դրա մասի ներկառուցում <script> պիտակի միջոցով, պատճենեք ստորև բերված HTML կոդը և տեղադրեք այն ձեր HTML ֆայլում:" or simply: "{{productName}}-ի կամ դրա մասի ներկառուցում <script> պիտակի միջոցով. Պատճենեք ստորև բերված HTML կոդը և տեղադրեք այն ձեր HTML ֆայլում."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation includes a period at the end of the sentence "ການຝັງ {{productName}} ຫຼືສ່ວນໜຶ່ງຂອງມັນໂດຍໃຊ້ແທັກ <script>", which is not present in the English original. While not strictly incorrect, it's inconsistent with the tone of the English prompt.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the period after 'ແທັກ <script>'.  The full instruction should read: 'ການຝັງ {{productName}} ຫຼືສ່ວນໜຶ່ງຂອງມັນໂດຍໃຊ້ແທັກ <script>'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'or its part' is translated as 'of een deel ervan'. While understandable, 'of een deel ervan' is a bit clunky. A more natural Dutch translation would be 'of een deel'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{productName}} of een deel insluiten met de <script> tag. Kopieer de onderstaande HTML code en voeg deze toe aan uw HTML bestand.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'spațiului' (space) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Embedding {{productName}} or its part'. It should be something more like 'integrării' (integration) or 'includerea'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Incorporarea integrării {{productName}} sau a unei părți a acestuia...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'cu ajutorul etichetei <script>' is a bit clunky. A more natural Romanian phrasing would be 'folosind eticheta <script>' or simply 'prin eticheta <script>'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Incorporarea integrării {{productName}} sau a unei părți a acestuia folosind eticheta <script>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation uses 'HTML code එක පිටපත් කර' which translates to 'copy the HTML code'. While understandable, it's slightly less formal than the English 'Copy the HTML code below'.
The phrase 'ඔබේ HTML ගොඩුවට ඇතුළු කරන්න' is grammatically correct, but slightly less smooth. It translates to 'insert into your HTML file'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබේ HTML ගොඩුවට ඊළඟ කොටස ඇතුළු කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses a Cyrillic 'ј' which isn't standard in modern Serbian (Latin script). While understood, it's generally avoided.
The use of the genitive case '-a' after '{{productName}}' might sound awkward. While grammatically correct, it's often more natural to use the nominative case in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ugrađivanje {{productName}} ili njegovog dela pomoću <script> taga. Kopirajte HTML kod ispod i umetnite ga u svoju HTML datoteku.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'простору' (prostoru) doesn't quite convey the intended meaning of 'Embedding'. It implies 'space' rather than the act of embedding. A more suitable term would be something along the lines of 'Вбудовування коду' or 'Вбудовування'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Вбудовування коду {{productName}} або його частини за допомогою тегу <script>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'представлений нижче' (predstavlenyj nizche) sounds a bit formal and clunky in this context. A more natural phrasing would be better.
